citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:48 am on
19-DEC-19.
Contacted the Director by phone. Director was not available to accompany on inspection. Was off the facility site
conducting an school education program.
